Uses of Class
KinectPV2.Skeleton

    • Uses of Skeleton in KinectPV2

      Methods in KinectPV2 that return Skeleton 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Skeleton[] Device.getSkeleton3d()
      Get Skeleton as Joints with Positions and Tracking states in 3D, (x,y,z) joint and orientation, Skeleton up to 6 users
      Skeleton[] Device.getSkeletonColorMap()
      Get Skeleton as Joints with Positions and Tracking states base on color Image,
      Skeleton[] Device.getSkeletonDepthMap()
      Get Skeleton as Joints with Positions and Tracking states base on Depth Image, Skeleton with only (x, y) skeleton position mapped to the depth Image, get z value from the Depth Image.
